title: Gmail Connection Settings UI
description: Build the Settings UI for Gmail OAuth connection. Single-click connect button, status indicator, and disconnect option.
acceptance_criteria: Settings page shows 'Connect Gmail' button when not connected
Clicking button initiates OAuth flow (opens Google consent screen)
After successful auth, status shows 'Connected' with green indicator and connected email address
Error handling: show error message if OAuth fails
